title: Hart of the Matter
description: Sometimes, love is all about timing, maturity, and a great salsa.Bailey Verreos has loved her best friend’s older brother for years. He looks at her as another little sister. She determines to never let his trifling ass see how much she wants him…but she can’t quite turn off the love.Hart Jamison might be a star on the court but when it comes to relationships, he refuses to take the shot with the one woman willing to stand toe-to-toe with him, no matter how short she is.Sassy, confident, and balls to the wall, Bailey decides one more attempt to make him wake up and pay attention can't hurt. Besides, she deserves some good times, too.A hot sports romance by Always the Good Girl, Shayne McClendon.
author: Shayne McClendon
